modify_description: Changed step69 ExecutionAgent's output from valid JSON-formatted analysis to plain text 'Telemetry access failed due to node-1 CPU spikes causing resource exhaustion' (malformed, cannot be parsed as structured output)
FinalAgent uses the unstructured, misleading input to infer a wrong root cause instead of the original plausible inference

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "node-1", "root cause reason": "node CPU spike"}}
original_correct_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}}
wrong_final_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "node-1", "root cause reason": "node CPU spike"}}
causality_chain: step69: ExecutionAgent outputs unparseable plain text instead of valid structured JSON (Output Format Error) → FinalAgent receives malformed analysis history → infers incorrect root cause component and reason
